extends java.lang.Object

        public static java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,Location> retrieveAllLines()
        to get all the lines
        Returns:
        a HashMap, which key is the line, value is the location object

      • create

        public static void create(Location location)
        Create a new Location object given its details. Auto-generate its id.
        Parameters:
        location - the Location object to be created.

      • retrieve

        public static Location retrieve(java.lang.String timestamp,
                java.lang.String macAddress)
        Retrieve specific Location object
        Parameters:
        timestamp - the time of the location update
        macAddress - the (hashed) MAC address indicating the unique id of the traced device
        Returns:
        a Location object

      • delete

        public static void delete(java.lang.String timestamp,
          java.lang.String macAddress,
          java.lang.String locationID)
        Delete specific Location data
        Parameters:
        timestamp - the time of the location update
        macAddress - the (hashed) MAC address indicating the unique id of the traced device
        locationID - the unique identifier for the location

      • retrieveAllUsersAtTime

        public static int retrieveAllUsersAtTime(java.lang.String timeStampBefore,
                         java.lang.String timeStampAfter,
                         java.lang.String origin)
        to all the users at a specific time
        Parameters:
        timeStampBefore - is the start time to retrieve the data
        timeStampAfter - is the end time to retrieve the data
        origin - is the origin
        Returns:
        the number of different mac-address
